lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump disparaged an actress named Jessica Drake, who over the weekend said that in 2006 he had groped and kissed her without her permission.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti reported from St. Augustine, and Alan Rappeport from Washington.
byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.print_headline: Another Accuser Comes Forward, to Be Dismissed by Trump
headline.main: Donald Trump Dismisses Latest Accuser: ‘Oh, I’m Sure She’s Never Been Grabbed Before’

snippet: Mr. Trump disparaged an actress named Jessica Drake, who over the weekend said that in 2006 he had groped and kissed her without her permission....
abstract: Donald Trump dismisses accusations by pornographic film actress Jessica Drake that he inappropriately groped and kissed her in 2006 and also offered her $10,000 to go to his hotel room.
